question: You are looking for a full-time job. Write a letter to an employment agency. In your letter:introduce yourselfexplain what sort of job you would likesay what experience and skills you haveBegin your letter as follows: Dear Sir/Madam
text: I am writing this letter requesting your assistance with my full-time job search.My name is Mert,a sales expert in financial services such as personal loans and credit cards.I  graduated from Istanbul University,Faculty of economics.In addition have a master's degree.
I opt for obtaining a challenging position in the financial area relevant to my professional background that would create value in a well-established global company.
During my career ı have worked for several banks as a salesperson.In recent years hence my experience I got promotions being a manager to lead sales teams.

My core competencies include sales business development solution selling strategies,team building and leading.I am good at preparing high-impact presentations and analyzes.Additionally,my key skills are being self-motivated,being a team player,decision making,critical thinking and planning.
Please find my detailed resume as an attachment to this letter.I am willing to introduce myself in a face-to-face interview even if don't have a relevant job opening suitable for me
I am looking to hearing from you.
